full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ES SLOB DPON PADMA SAMBHA'I MDZAD PA'I BSANGS RDZAS NI DKAR GSUM MNGAR GSUM BZANG DRUG TZANGDAN DAR PO DMAR GSER PHYE MAR GYI NGAR GYI BTAB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES SLOB DPON PADMA SAMBHA'I MDZAD PA'I BSANGS RDZAS NI DKAR GSUM MNGAR GSUM BZANG DRUG TZANGDAN DAR PO DMAR GSER PHYE MAR GYI NGAR GYI BTAB 'DI NI BDUN NYER GCIG BTAD SEL DU ZHI BAR GSUNGS PA'O, ,)
